vast north land

Initial territory +5 tiles when building a city. [NEWLINE] Campus, Theater Square, and Sanctuary districts get +1 adjacency bonus from Tundra tiles. [NEWLINE] Red Winter units are immune to blizzard damage. Enemy civilization units at war with Red Winter take +100% damage from blizzards in Red Winter territory.
Guards, attack!

Land Close Combat, Anti-Cavalry, and Cavalry units cause the enemy to retreat after attacking if they deal more damage to the enemy than they take. Enemies that cannot retreat take additional damage. [NEWLINE] However, this effect is negated against enemy heavy cavalry units.

Unique district of Red Winter. Substitute campus. [NEWLINE] The city in which this district is built gains [ICON_Food] +1 Food and [ICON_Production] +1 Production for each Tundra/Snow tile in its territory.

Cerino "Red Winter Federation Academy, the secretary has arrived! Be honored, Kamrad!" [NEWLINE] Marina "We Red Winter hunt like bears without fear!" [NEWLINE] Tomoe "If you don't mind, in exchange for greetings, would you like to ask about Chairman Celino's achievements so far?"
The Red Winter Secretariat invites you to your home city (if you accept, the location of the nearby partner city will be revealed).
Invited the Red Winter Secretariat to your city.
The Red Winter Secretariat proposes a map exchange.
Cerino: Did you call me, Kamrad?
Cerino: "Well, that's a good choice." [NEWLINE] Tomoe: "As expected! I believed in you!"
Cerino "Uh... Uuu... I want to go home..." [NEWLINE] Tomoe "Oh... is there a problem...?" [NEWLINE] (The declaration of friendship was rejected)
Cerino "Let's start a revolution together with me today!" [NEWLINE] Tomoe "Our revolution will surely succeed!" are present)
Cerino: "Well, that's a good choice." [NEWLINE] Tomoe: "As expected! I believed in you!"

Cerino "Don't tease me! We're going to purge you!?" [NEWLINE] Marina "Sabotage. This is because of sabotage!"
Cerino "It's time to prove my authority. I'm going to clean it up!" [NEWLINE] Marina "I will accuse the Secretariat of sabotage!"
Cerino "Go, my bodyguards! The target of the purge is over there!" Did)
Cerino "Purge, purge, purge!"
Cerino: "Hmm, how's it going? Have you realized the power of the general secretary?" [NEWLINE]
Cerino: "Finally do you understand my authority? What, don't be afraid. I'm generous!" tied)
